title: Did Trump inherit a stockpile of vaults from Obama?
subtitle: United States President Donald Trump has repeatedly tried to blame the "empty safes" of federal emergency medical supplies.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: When President Donald Trump of the United States took office, he inherited a strategic national stockpile that lacked adequate supplies of mechanical ventilation equipment that would have helped the nation at the beginning of the COVID-19 epidemic of 2020.
